life.threedee.game

Class SpecialPointsConsumable

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.game.Consumable
      • life.threedee.game.SpecialPointsConsumable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapFeature, Tickable, ThreeDeeObject

    public class SpecialPointsConsumable
extends Consumable
    A Special Points Consumable that can be eaten in the game.

        public SpecialPointsConsumable(Point center,
                       int level)
        Constructs a SpecialPointsConsumable at a given location when it's a given level. The level decides the amount of sides.
        Parameters:
        center - The center of this SpecialPointsConsumable.
        level - The level during which this SpecialPointsConsumable is created.

      • getRData

        public TColorTransfer getRData(Vector v,
                      Point p,
                      double minT)
        Description copied from interface: ThreeDeeObject
        Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value. The minT is passed so as to avoid calculating color if it will not be used anyways.
        Specified by:
